snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Thursday’s selections include a chart linking fictional characters like Superman, Princess Leia and Mr. Spock, and what big rubber bands...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Thursday’s selections include a chart linking fictional characters like Superman, Princess Leia and Mr. Spock, and what big rubber bands could do to your face.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Planetary Destruction Survivors, and Rubber-Band Faces
